content: i love buttoned cowls i already have 3 on the blog the sparkly the apple crisp and the herringbone buttoned cowls but i ve been wanting to do a comfy squares version for a while it seemed like a simple project for easing back into pattern designing after my little newborn-snuggles-filled hiatus so on henry s first trip with me to the yarn store we picked up a few skeins of lion brand s wool-ease this yarn has great drape and i love how the cowl turned out
